doc:
Anne Reid https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anne_Reid 0 Anne Reid, MBE (born 28 May 1935) is an English stage, film and television actress, known for her roles as Valerie Barlow in the soap opera Coronation Street (1961–71); Jean in the sitcom Dinnerladies (1998–2000); and her BAFTA-nominated role as Celia Dawson in Last Tango in Halifax (2012–2016). She won the London Film Critics Circle Award for British Actress of the Year for the film The Mother (2003). Anne_Reid , MBE ( born 28_May_1935 ) is an_English_stage , film_and_television_actress , known for her_roles as Valerie_Barlow in the_soap_opera_Coronation_Street ( 1961 – 71 ) ; Jean in the_sitcom Dinnerladies ( 1998 – 2000 ) ; and her_BAFTA-nominated_role as Celia_Dawson in Last_Tango in Halifax ( 2012 – 2016 ) . She won the_London_Film_Critics_Circle_Award for British_Actress of the_Year for the_film The_Mother_(_2003_) .
